title.rendered: Best Practices for Small Colleges and Universities

content.rendered:
Small schools can often have vastly different workflows, resources and staffing from that of their large school peers. Watch this webinar to learn more about how to best leverage Handshake for schools with fewer than 5000 students.

Followup Resources:

  • Presentation slide deck: View the deck for all links shared during the webinar.

Have additional questions? Reach out to your Relationship Manager or our Support Team via our Help Center.

View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: How to best leverage Handshake for schools with fewer than 5000 students
